name: Consultantassistant
tagline: This repository is used to store the ConsultantAssistant application.
body:
### Welcome to the Consultant Assistant Github

This project was started in early 2014, the intent of the application is to simulate an application that could help an independent sales consultant in their daily activities. Which could range from processing orders, to looking up customers/adding new customers, and to staying in contact with customers.

### Get Involved
If you would like to get involved with this project reach out to Brad Root(@broot02). Can also be reached at rootbrad86@gmail.com

### Authors and Contributors
This project was founded by Brad Root(@broot02).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
